```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}

stressor <- read.csv(here("data/stressor.csv"))
```

```{r}
str(stressor)
```




```{r}
clean <- function(df) {
  df %>%
    mutate(state = str_remove_all(state, "[^A-Za-z ]"),
           stressor = str_remove_all(stressor, "[^A-Za-z ]"),
           year = as.numeric(year)) %>% 
             clean_names()
}
```

```{r}
stressor_clean <- clean(stressor)
```

```{r}
str(stressor_clean)
```



```{r}
  stressor_long <- stressor_clean %>% pivot_longer(
    cols = c("january_march", "april_june", "july_september", "october_december"),
    names_to = "months",
    values_to = "stress_pct"
  ) %>% 
  mutate(quarter = case_when(months == "january_march" ~ 1,
    months == "april_june" ~ 2, 
    months == "july_september" ~ 3, 
    months == "october_december" ~ 4
  ))
  
```
